actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 93-120.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #127 (344-0).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, S. Rept. 93-947.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for payments by the Postal Service to the civil service retirement fund for increases in the unfunded liability of the fund due to increases in benefits for Postal Service employees, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Makes the United States Postal Service liable for that portion of any estimated increase in the unfunded liability of the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund which is attributable to any benefits payable from such Fund to active and retired Postal Service personnel and their survivors when such increase results from an employee-managements agreement authorizing increases in pay on which benefits are computed. Amends 5 U.S.C. 8348, and 39 U.S.C. 1005)d)

titles.title: A bill to provide for payments by the Postal Service to the civil service retirement fund for increases in the unfunded liability of the fund due to increases in benefits for Postal Service employees, and for other purposes.
